result.markdown:
--- title: "`dplyr::glimpse()`: Prettier than `str()`" date: "6/26/23" categories: - dataframes - summarizing --- Instead of `str(df)` to see the structure of a dataframe, try `dplyr::glimpse()`^[Technically, `glimpse` is from the `pillar` package, but it's re-exported by `dplyr`, which I usually have loaded anyway.] instead. It gives a horizontal output and shows more data than fits with `str()`: ::: {.cell hash='index_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_172e8f21959cc84f117b9b41b2dbc834'} ```{.r .cell-code} dplyr::glimpse(palmerpenguins::penguins) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Rows: 344 Columns: 8 $ species Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Adel… $ island Torgersen, Torgersen, Torgersen, Torgersen, Torgerse… $ bill_length_mm 39.1, 39.5, 40.3, NA, 36.7, 39.3, 38.9, 39.2, 34.1, … $ bill_depth_mm 18.7, 17.4, 18.0, NA, 19.3, 20.6, 17.8, 19.6, 18.1, … $ flipper_length_mm 181, 186, 195, NA, 193, 190, 181, 195, 193, 190, 186… $ body_mass_g 3750, 3800, 3250, NA, 3450, 3650, 3625, 4675, 3475, … $ sex male, female, female, NA, female, male, female, male… $ year 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007… ``` ::: ::: You can also force more data to be shown with the `width` option: ::: {.cell hash='index_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_f2be168c1035aa687b04742f9da9bd9b'} ```{.r .cell-code} dplyr::glimpse(palmerpenguins::penguins, width = 200) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Rows: 344 Columns: 8 $ species Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Adel… $ island Torgersen, Torgersen, Torgersen, Torgersen, Torgersen, Torgersen, Torgersen, Torgersen, Torgersen, Torgersen, Torgersen, Torgersen, Torgersen, Torgersen, Torgersen, Torgers… $ bill_length_mm 39.1, 39.5, 40.3, NA, 36.7, 39.3, 38.9, 39.2, 34.1, 42.0, 37.8, 37.8, 41.1, 38.6, 34.6, 36.6, 38.7, 42.5, 34.4, 46.0, 37.8, 37.7, 35.9, 38.2, 38.8, 35.3, 40.6, 40.5, 37.9, … $ bill_depth_mm 18.7, 17.4, 18.0, NA, 19.3, 20.6, 17.8, 19.6, 18.1, 20.2, 17.1, 17.3, 17.6, 21.2, 21.1, 17.8, 19.0, 20.7, 18.4, 21.5, 18.3, 18.7, 19.2, 18.1, 17.2, 18.9, 18.6, 17.9, 18.6, … $ flipper_length_mm 181, 186, 195, NA, 193, 190, 181, 195, 193, 190, 186, 180, 182, 191, 198, 185, 195, 197, 184, 194, 174, 180, 189, 185, 180, 187, 183, 187, 172, 180, 178, 178, 188, 184, 195… $ body_mass_g 3750, 3800, 3250, NA, 3450, 3650, 3625, 4675, 3475, 4250, 3300, 3700, 3200, 3800, 4400, 3700, 3450, 4500, 3325, 4200, 3400, 3600, 3800, 3950, 3800, 3800, 3550, 3200, 3150, … $ sex male, female, female, NA, female, male, female, male, NA, NA, NA, NA, female, male, male, female, female, male, female, male, female, male, female, male, male, female, male… $ year 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007… ``` ::: :::
